item.title: World Economy Latest:
item.description: World Economy Facing Synchronized Slowdown The World Bank has downgraded its global growth forecast for 2023 to 2.9%, down from 3.6% in 2022. The downgrade is due to a number of factors, including the war in Ukraine, rising inflation, and tighter monetary policy.
